title: Govt retains 14 pc rise in capital investment of Rs 67,000 cr by 8 power PSUs in FY25
description: The government has announced a significant increase in capital investments by eight state-owned power companies for the upcoming fiscal year. Various companies like Power Grid Corporation, NTPC Ltd, and NHPC Ltd are set to boost their investments compared to previous years.
